extendedInfo.description: The best states and phrases for ChatOn social network.The you can share all the states in all your social networks (Line, Facebook, Whatsapp, twitter, WeChat, ChatOn ...)The application contains many states that will emerge at random.The phrases and statements you can hear them, for this you need to have TTS libraries installed google or Samsung.These states can also be used as quotes to share with your friends or family.
